verses.verse: The king<WH4428> shall joy<WH8055> in your strength<WH5797>, O Lord<WH3068>; and in your salvation<WH3444> how greatly<WH3966> shall he rejoice<WH1523>!
You have given<WH5414> him his heart<WH3820>'s desire<WH8378>, and have not withheld<WH4513> the request<WH782> of his lips<WH8193>. Selah<WH5542>.
For you meet<WH6923> him with the blessings<WH1293> of goodness<WH2896>: you set<WH7896> a crown<WH5850> of pure gold<WH6337> on his head<WH7218>.
He asked<WH7592> life<WH2416> of you<WH5414>, and you gave it him<WH753>, even length of days<WH3117> for ever<WH5769> and ever<WH5703>.
His glory<WH3519> is great<WH1419> in your salvation<WH3444>: honor<WH1935> and majesty<WH1926> have you laid upon him<WH7737>.
For you have made<WH7896> him most blessed<WH1293> for ever<WH5703>: you have made<WH2302> him exceedingly glad<WH8057> with your favor<WH6440>.
For the king<WH4428> trusts<WH982> in the Lord<WH3068>, and through the mercy<WH2617> of the most High<WH5945> he shall not be moved<WH4131>.
Your hand<WH3027> shall find out<WH4672> all your enemies<WH341>: your right hand<WH3225> shall find out<WH4672> those that hate you<WH8130>.

You shall make<WH7896> them as a fiery<WH784> oven<WH8574> in the time<WH6256> of your anger<WH6440>: the Lord<WH3068> shall swallow them up<WH1104> in his wrath<WH639>, and the fire<WH784> shall devour them<WH398>.
Their fruit<WH6529> shall you destroy<WH6> from the earth<WH776>, and their seed<WH2233> from among the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120>.
For they intended<WH5186> evil<WH7451> against you<WH2803>: they imagined a mischievous device<WH4209>, which they are not able to perform<WH3201>.
Therefore shall you make<WH7896> them turn their back<WH7926>, when you shall make ready<WH3559> your arrows upon your strings<WH4340> against the face of them<WH6440>.
Be you exalted<WH7311>, Lord<WH3068>, in your own strength<WH5797>: so will we sing<WH7891> and praise<WH2167> your power<WH1369>.
